content: In Neuromancer, the main antagonist for the protagonist, Case, is an artificial intelligence known as Wintermute. Wintermute is the other half of a powerful AI system known as Neuromancer, which was created by a corporation called Tessier-Ashpool. Wintermute is portrayed as a highly intelligent, powerful and relentless force that seeks to merge with its other half, Neuromancer, to become an even more powerful entity. Wintermute is the one who hires Case and Armitage for the dangerous hacking job and is the driving force behind the plot of the novel, as it manipulates the characters to achieve its goal.
